short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Reddit ad blocker that removes promoted posts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reddit AdBlock | Redblocker helps you get rid of all those distracting promoted posts on Reddit, giving you a clean and uninterrupted browsing experience. Whether you're using the old or new Reddit layout, Redblocker works seamlessly to keep your feed ad-free and focused on the content that matters to you.
